title: Coca-Cola boosts organic sales
text:
Coca-Cola boosts organic sales 9:35pm IST - 01:02 
Non-carbonated drinks like vitamin water and teas lifted organic revenues at Coca-Cola. As Fred Katayama reports, the company has been investing in these categories as consumers drink less soda. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Non-carbonated drinks like vitamin water and teas lifted organic revenues at Coca-Cola. As Fred Katayama reports, the company has been investing in these categories as consumers drink less soda.
